info.description: Allows to view,create,update and premature the fiduciary orders
info.title: API for fiduciary orders and premature orders

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: fiduciaryOrderId
parameters.description: Key or Identifier of the Fiduciary Order

parameters.name: fiduciaryOrderId
parameters.description: Key or Identifier of the Fiduciary Order

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

put.description: Updates the early maturity date in a fiduciary order

parameters.name: fiduciaryOrderId
parameters.description: Key or Identifier of the Fiduciary Order

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

frontOfficeInstructions.description: Optional free text field to capture any narrative for the account officer.
Optional free text field to capture any narrative for the account officer.

dealerInstructions.description: Special instructions regarding the order for the attention of the dealer making the placement

dealerInstruction.description: Special instructions regarding the order for the attention of the dealer making the placement

chargeDate.description: The date on which the charge will be debited to the charge account

chargeEvent.description: Defines the event for which the charges are applicable.Possible Values : Change, Drawdown or Maturity

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

splitAmounts.description: The amount into which the existing order is to be split

splitAmount.description: The amount into which the existing order is to be split

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

fiduciaryOrderType.description: The type of Fiduciary deposit  i.e. Fixed or Notice

bicId.description: Bank Identifier Code (BIC) of the Beneficiary bank.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

orderDate.description: The order date of the instructions contained within the transaction

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

maturityDate.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

pooling.description: Specifies how the order is be pooled.Possible Values : MANUAL - The pool group can then be amended manually by the dealer, AUTO - The order will be pooled automatically at authorisation with other orders of the same currency, value date and maturity date and any additional pooling fields, NONE - The order will not be pooled

interestRate.description: Identifies the bid rate of the related currency for the defined time period

interestDayBasis.description: Defines the method of calculation for accrued interest on a Security

drawdownAccountId.description: The identifier of the drawdown account

principalLiquidationAccountId.description: The account to be credited with the principal at maturity of the order

interestLiquidationAccountId.description: The account to be credited with the interest at maturity of the order

accountOfficerId.description: The identifier of the department head or specific account officer responsible for the customer

commissionCode.description: These field control the allocation of Periodic commission where the field COMM.CODE is the trigger for periodic commission and the field CSN.CODE is a system maintained field and hold the commission amount relating to the period band

commissionAmount.description: Amount of commission charged for the payment created with respect to the commission type used.

commissionTaken.description: Specifies whether commission is debited from the customer at the start of the contract, or at the end.Possible Values : ADVANCE, ARREARS, ARREARS-INT, ARREARS-PRIN or ARREARS-BOTH

commissionBasis.description: Specifies the base amount to be used in the calculation of commission.Possible Values : INTEREST, INCOME(PRINCIPAL+INTEREST) or PRINCIPAL

renewalType.description: Specifies the status that the new order will be created with AUTO - The order will be generated fully authorised subject to validation checks.SEMI - The order will be created in unauthorised status subject to validation checks.MANUAL - The order will be created with hold status.NONE -  No renewal will be generated

renewalAmount.description: Defines how the principal of an automatically renewed order is to be calculated

roundRenewal.description: Specifies whether the principal of the renewed order is to be rounded to the nearest multiple amount of the currency

renewalDrawdownAccountId.description: Account to be used as the drawdown account for the renewed order

renewalPrincipalLiquidationAccountId.description: Account to be used as the principal liquidation account in the renewed order

renewalIntrestLiquidationAccountId.description: Account to be used as the interest liquidation account in the renewed order

renewalCommissionAccountId.description: Account to be used as the commission charge account in the renewed order

replaceOrder.description: Specifies the existing Order which is to be replaced

printDealSlip.description: Denotes whether a deal slip is to be produced if a deal slip is defined for the appropriate activity of the order

sendConfirm.description: Specifies whether a confirmation should be sent for the order if defined for the appropriate activity

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

frontOfficeInstructions.description: Optional free text field to capture any narrative for the account officer.
Optional free text field to capture any narrative for the account officer.

options.description: The usable options for the override

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

fiduciaryOrderType.description: The type of Fiduciary deposit  i.e. Fixed or Notice

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

orderDate.description: The order date of the instructions contained within the transaction

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

maturityDate.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

earlyMaturityDate.description: Represents the date on which the order will be early matured

penaltyCommissionAmount.description: The actual amount of penalty commission

defaultPenaltyCommissionAmount.description: The default amount of penalty commission

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.
